title: Bracelet, 19th century
description: Six bands of gold, each ornamented with six half-pearls and a vine design in colored gold, crossing four flexible strans of gold.  Clasp closing concealed in one band.  Two half pearls and small chain at clasp are missing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bracelet, 19th century.
19th century. Pearls, gold. Gift of Norvin Hewitt Green. 1938-58-850.
